statements: SELECT * FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE metabolite_name = 'Glucose';
SELECT metabolite_name, metabolite_concentration FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE sample_type = 'blood' ORDER BY metabolite_concentration DESC;
SELECT pathway_name FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE patient_id = '123abc' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE study_id = '456xyz' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT metabolite_name) AS unique_metabolites FROM MetabolomicsData;
SELECT id, metabolite_name, metabolite_concentration FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE pathway_name = 'Glycolysis'
SELECT study_id, patient_id, timestamp FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE metabolite_concentration > 10.0
SELECT * FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE sample_type = 'Serum' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT pathway_name FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE patient_id = '123456'
SELECT metabolite_name, sample_type FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE study_id = '789012'
SELECT * FROM MetabolomicsData;
SELECT SampleID, MetaboliteName, MetaboliteConcentration FROM MetabolomicsData ORDER BY SampleID DESC;
SELECT MetaboliteName, MetaboliteConcentration FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE MetaboliteConcentration > 10;
SELECT PathwayName, PathwayDescription FROM MetabolicPathways WHERE PathwayName LIKE 'Glycolysis%';
SELECT SampleID, MetaboliteName FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE SampleID = 3;
SELECT * FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE MetaboliteConcentration > 50 ORDER BY MetaboliteName DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SampleID, MetaboliteName FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE SampleID IN (1, 3, 5) AND MetaboliteConcentration < 30 ORDER BY SampleID ASC;
SELECT PathwayID, PathwayName FROM MetabolicPathways WHERE PathwayName LIKE 'Glycolysis%' AND PathwayID BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY PathwayID DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT MetaboliteName FROM MetabolomicsData WHERE MetaboliteConcentration >= 25 AND SampleID = 7;
SELECT SampleID, COUNT(*) AS TotalMetabolites FROM MetabolomicsData GROUP BY SampleID HAVING TotalMetabolites > 5 ORDER BY TotalMetabolites DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM metabolomics_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, concentration FROM metabolomics_samples WHERE concentration > 10;
SELECT sample_name, metabolite_name FROM metabolomics_samples WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM metabolomics_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT pathway_name, related_metabolites FROM metabolic_pathways;
SELECT sample_name, concentration FROM metabolomics_samples WHERE concentration > 5 ORDER BY concentration DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sample_name, metabolite_name FROM metabolomics_samples WHERE metabolite_name LIKE 'glucose%' ORDER BY sample_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT pathway_name FROM metabolic_pathways WHERE LENGTH(related_metabolites) > 100 ORDER BY pathway_id;
SELECT disease_name, LEFT(disease_description, 50) AS short_description FROM disease_mechanisms WHERE LENGTH(disease_description) > 200 ORDER BY disease_id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT sample_name, metabolite_name, concentration, pathway_name FROM metabolomics_samples JOIN metabolic_pathways ON metabolomics_samples.sample_id = metabolic_pathways.pathway_id ORDER BY sample_id, pathway_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Metabolites;
SELECT metabolite_name, molecular_weight FROM Metabolites ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_id = 3;
SELECT sample_name, collection_date, collection_location FROM Samples WHERE collection_location LIKE '%Lab%';
SELECT * FROM Analysis WHERE abundance > 0.5 AND analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Metabolites ORDER BY metabolite_name DESC, molecular_weight ASC
SELECT sample_name, collection_date FROM Samples WHERE collection_location = 'Lab A'
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Pathways WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50
SELECT metabolite_name, chemical_formula, molecular_weight FROM Metabolites WHERE molecular_weight BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(analysis_id) AS num_analysis FROM Analysis GROUP BY sample_id HAVING num_analysis > 3
SELECT * FROM Metabolites
SELECT name, molecular_formula FROM Metabolites WHERE mass > 100
SELECT description FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_id = 3
SELECT name, description FROM Diseases ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM MetabolitePathwayRelation WHERE metabolite_id = 5
SELECT * FROM Metabolites WHERE mass > 100 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, molecular_formula FROM Metabolites WHERE metabolite_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT DISTINCT name, description FROM Pathways JOIN DiseasePathwayRelation ON DiseasePathwayRelation.pathway_id = Pathways.pathway_id

SELECT Diseases.name AS Disease, Pathways.name AS Pathway FROM Diseases JOIN DiseasePathwayRelation ON Diseases.disease_id = DiseasePathwayRelation.disease_id JOIN Pathways ON DiseasePathwayRelation.pathway_id = Pathways.pathway_id ORDER BY Disease

SELECT Metabolites.name AS Metabolite, Pathways.name AS Pathway, Diseases.name AS Disease FROM Metabolites JOIN MetabolitePathwayRelation ON Metabolites.metabolite_id = MetabolitePathwayRelation.metabolite_id JOIN Pathways ON MetabolitePathwayRelation.pathway_id = Pathways.pathway_id JOIN DiseasePathwayRelation ON Pathways.pathway_id = DiseasePathwayRelation.pathway_id JOIN Diseases ON DiseasePathwayRelation.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id ORDER BY Metabolite
